text: With everything that is happening with Square Enix and the Final Fantasy XV fallout, what are you thoughts on fans vs studios?
Tabitha leaving was a bit sudden, but no real surprise as he was kind in the runt as Inafune(no real creative control), and I wish his new company the best.
And while I understand the devs being angry about not finishing the DLC, I have a feeling FFXV was just burning a whole in Square's pocket money wise.
So I can see both sides of the argument, but I think they should have at least said the DLC is on hold, then release Ep. Arden to tide people over.

This is the first im hearing about it, it sounds kinda crazy, and there may be a lot more we don't know about. Can't really give you my opinion on this one since I'm out of the loop :smiley:
But I'd love to hear your thoughts on it though!

And about the gap year and traveling, I thinks it's a valid choice for sure. If you use your time wisely during the year it can be beneficial, but you can fall into the trap of wasting time and when you realize it the year has gone by.
Traveling is always an awesome experience, so I say whenever you get the chance, go for it. It's important to experience different cultures and perspectives when you visit other countries =D
